entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 5:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: NE 45 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
